component.text: Communication is successful when the intended message has been received and confirmed.
Before communication can begin, we may have to reach an agreement on the language used.
Before communication can begin, we may have to reach an agreement on the method used.
1. I would like to order 3 black shirts, size medium.
2. Yes, I understand your order: 3 medium, black shirts.
3. Yes, that is correct. Thank you.
1. I can speak Japanese and English.
2. I can speak Spanish and English.
3. We can communicate in English then!
2. Writes note: Sorry I do not understand signing.
3. Writes note: Can we use written notes?
